reviews.review: Counter-Strike is brilliant in its Terrorist vs. Counter-Terrorist execution, as each objective-based match comes down to teamwork, strategy, and pure skill. Loving it.

I would recommend this game to people who like fps games and want to try something new. I got this game when it wasn't free. If you buy this game free without prime the only thing bad is the hackers. If you get over that and get to level 21 to get free prime to face mostly legit players you should have a good time.
